CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Institute of Technology relative to Borealis Graduate School?
SRP.A: Zenith Institute of Technology is {below} Borealis Graduate School in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Celestial College relative to Zenith Institute of Technology?
SRP.A: Celestial College is {below} Zenith Institute of Technology in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard School of Arts relative to Borealis Graduate School?
SRP.A: Aethelgard School of Arts is {below} Borealis Graduate School in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total faculty satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Celestial College}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total faculty satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Borealis Graduate School}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Academy's minimum Faculty Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Academy's minimum Faculty Satisfaction is in {2008}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverhaven Polytechnic's minimum Faculty Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverhaven Polytechnic's minimum Faculty Satisfaction is in {2007}.

NC.Q: Was the total Faculty Satisfaction in 2010 higher or lower than in 2011?
NC.A: The total faculty satisfaction in 2010 was {higher} than in 2011.

NC.Q: Was the total Faculty Satisfaction in 2008 higher or lower than in 2011?
NC.A: The total faculty satisfaction in 2008 was {lower} than in 2011.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2009, did the total Faculty Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 2005 and 2012?
NC.A: The change in total faculty satisfaction between 2006 and 2009 was {smaller} than between 2005 and 2012.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2012, did the total Faculty Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 2009 and 2012?
NC.A: The change in total faculty satisfaction between 2005 and 2012 was {larger} than between 2009 and 2012.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Celestial College} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Celestial College and Meridian Academy first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Celestial College and Meridian Academy first exchanged leading positions in {2005}.
